prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_1k7p9f",
  "name": "Jain-Friendly Vegan Weeknight Basics (No-Heat, Affordable Family)",
  "core_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Vegan",
      "HighProtein"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Indian",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "NoHeat"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Affordable"
    ],
    "EthicsReligious": [
      "JainFriendly"
    ],
    "Allergens": []
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Tofu & Pea Coconut Korma (Jain-Friendly) with Brown Basmati",
  "description": "Mild, creamy coconut korma with tofu and peas, served over brown basmati rice. No onion, no garlic, and family-friendly for a quick weeknight dinner.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Rinse brown basmati rice until water runs clear.",
    "Cube tofu into bite-size pieces.",
    "Measure cumin seeds, turmeric, garam masala, and salt.",
    "Open coconut milk and diced tomatoes.",
    "Rinse and chop coriander."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Combine brown basmati rice with water in a pot, bring to a boil, then cover and simmer until tender; keep warm.",
    "Heat sunflower oil in a wide pan on medium; add cumin seeds and toast until fragrant.",
    "Stir in turmeric, then add diced tomatoes; simmer 3–4 minutes to reduce slightly.",
    "Pour in coconut milk and add salt; stir to combine.",
    "Add tofu and peas; simmer gently 8–10 minutes until peas are tender and sauce thickens.",
    "Stir in garam masala and adjust salt to taste; rest 2 minutes off heat.",
    "Fluff rice and plate; spoon korma over rice and finish with coriander."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "brown basmati rice",
      "quantity": "1 1/2 cups",
      "preparation": "rinsed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "water",
      "quantity": "3 cups (for rice) + as needed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "sunflower oil",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cumin seeds",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "turmeric",
      "quantity": "1/2 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "diced tomatoes",
      "quantity": "1 cup"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "coconut milk",
      "quantity": "400 ml"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "3/4 teaspoon, or to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tofu",
      "quantity": "400 g",
      "preparation": "cubed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "peas",
      "quantity": "1 1/2 cups"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garam masala",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "coriander",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons",
      "preparation": "chopped"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "HighProtein",
      "Vegan"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Indian",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "NoHeat"
    ],
    "EthicsReligious": [
      "JainFriendly"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Affordable"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Dairy",
      "Soy"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
